name: The OP's Mayo Blasters
description:
This game is a starting point to collaborate with other Gamestop Marketplace Creators to add custom unlockable assets and game modes.

It is a hovercar shooter inspired by some of my old N64 favorites like Star Fox, Smash Bro's, and that one 90's computer game my school had where you pick a car and race it.

NFT's
https://nft.gamestop.com/collection/the-ops

JOIN OUR DISCORD
https://discord.com/invite/ep4AgkEfqY


Features:
- Open Play mode (free)
- Singleplayer mode (different maps depending on collab password, eventually wallet gated)
- Multiplayer 1vs1
- Scavenger Hunts to win Prizes
- 3 Vehicles with unique Stats
